attributes.action: A public vote to confirm if the BREXIT deal is the will of the people by Oct31
attributes.background:
Prime Minister May says she knows the will of the people, but the truth is the BREXIT deal was not in front of the public in 2016 and much has changed.

Put the final deal to a public vote along with hard BREXIT and Remain by October 31st for people to express their will and vote on their futures.
